storyTitle: As Employee, I want to receive reminders for my upcoming shifts to achieve better preparedness.

testCases.title: Validate reminder subscription functionality
preconditions: Employee account exists in the system with valid credentials
Employee has at least one upcoming shift scheduled
Reminder service is operational and accessible
Employee has a valid email address and/or phone number registered in their profile
Web interface is accessible and functional

steps.action: Navigate to the login page of the web interface
steps.expectedResult: Login page is displayed with username and password fields

steps.action: Enter valid employee credentials (username and password) and click the login button
steps.expectedResult: User is successfully authenticated and redirected to the dashboard or home page

steps.action: Locate and click on the profile or settings menu option
steps.expectedResult: Profile or settings menu expands showing available options

steps.action: Navigate to the reminder settings or notification preferences section
steps.expectedResult: Reminder settings page is displayed showing available reminder options and current preferences

steps.action: Review the available reminder options including delivery method (email/SMS), timing preferences, and shift details inclusion
steps.expectedResult: All reminder configuration options are visible and accessible

steps.action: Select preferred reminder delivery method (email or SMS or both)
steps.expectedResult: Selected delivery method is highlighted or checked

steps.action: Set the reminder timing preference (e.g., 24 hours before shift, 2 hours before shift)
steps.expectedResult: Timing preference is selected and displayed correctly

steps.action: Enable the option to include shift details in reminders
steps.expectedResult: Shift details inclusion option is checked or enabled

steps.action: Click the Save or Subscribe button to confirm reminder preferences
steps.expectedResult: System processes the request and displays a confirmation message indicating reminder settings have been saved successfully

steps.action: Verify the confirmation message contains details of the saved preferences
steps.expectedResult: Confirmation message displays the selected delivery method, timing, and other preferences accurately

steps.action: Refresh the reminder settings page or navigate away and return to verify persistence
steps.expectedResult: Previously saved reminder preferences are displayed correctly, confirming they were persisted in the system

postconditions: Employee reminder preferences are saved in the database
Employee is subscribed to the reminder service
System is configured to send reminders based on the saved preferences
API endpoint POST /api/reminders/subscribe has been successfully called
Employee will receive reminders for upcoming shifts according to their preferences
